I have an idea for a bakery, it is just an idea no sales

That sounds great! Starting a bakery can be a rewarding endeavor. Do you want some assistance on how to turn this idea into a actual business? I can help you with aspects like business planning, research and analysis, funding options, location selection, equipment procurement, recipe development, menu selection, marketing strategy, etc.
